snippet.title: WIZORDUM - Episode 2 Teaser
snippet.description:
After cleansing corruption from the town of Grimbrook, the hunt for the source of Chaos leads you on a journey to all-new locations. Episode Two enhances spell-slinging with a new weapon, adding alternate attacks, improved elemental damage, and a refined magic system.

Search for coin-filled coffers throughout every puzzle-filled quest. After each level, visit the newly added sorcerer's shop to exchange valuable treasure for weapon upgrades to unlock alternate attacks, spell improvements, and more.

We've been hard at work on the Episode 2 content update, and this is just a taste of what's to come. Let us know what you think. What are you most excited about?

Follow Wizordum
• Twitter 🐦https://twitter.com/wizordum
• Discord 💬 https://discord.gg/74q83UnZm3


---------------------------------------------
Edited by Kyle Blessing
Directed & Produced by Jeron Moore & Kyle Blessing
Capture Support: Primoz Vvok
Voice-over by Tre Mosley
Trailer Music Composed by Chipper Hammond
Using Themes from “Wizordum” by Tim Stoney
Executive Producer: Jeron Moore
Special Thanks: Tomaz Vvok, Chipper Hammond
